ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the seas flood and overflow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the oceans begin to flow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the seas are made to burst forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the oceans are swept away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the seas are made to flow forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When the seas are poured forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the seas are flowed out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the seas are burst forth (got dried up);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when the oceans are gushed forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the seas are erupted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:3] and when the seas are burst forth, released one upon the other, forming one mass of water, so that the sweet [water] mixes with the salty;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When the seas are poured forth) into each other, the sweet into the salty, such that they become one sea,
